projects.name: Voyager
projects.about: These tough times have made us all aware of the importance of our loved ones and through this app, users can bring a their family and friend's faces by sending them their favoritedelicacy, medicines, or a simple heartfelt gift.

projects.name: ChatCube
projects.about: ChatCube is a 1:1 chatting application. You can invite your friends and chat with in realtime. You can send them emojis, photos text messages and many more.
